title: Why is  it required to fix a splitter when use ADSL terminal and how to fix it？
answer:
The splitter can reduce the noise interference over line, it's strongly recommended to fix a splitter before the telephone if it's required to use concurrent telephone.
Splitter has 3 interfaces：
LINE:connect to the telephone jack on the wall.
PHONE:connect with telephone.
MODEM:connect with ADSL terminal.
